title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K Season11 s11 BluRay HEVC AAC
description: Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K Season11 BluRay HEVC AAC THIS TORRENT USES X265 HEVC (High Efficiency Video Coding) VIDEO PLEASE USE A PLAYER THAT SUPPORTS X265 HEVC VIDEO LIKE VLC, POTPLAYER, ETC DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 5.1 SURROUND - TRACK2 IS 2.0 STEREO SUBS ARE SOFTWARE ENCODED AND OFF BY DEFAULT OPENING/CLOSING PRODUCTION LOGOS WERE REMOVED SO THE ENCODE IS ~17-18SECONDS SHORTER Mystery Science Theater 3000 The Return Season11 BluRay (2017) x265 video: 1920x1080 HEVC preset=slow 8bit CRF: average=23.45 range=21.50-25.25 bitrate: average~3124kbps range=2180kbps-4273kbps audio1 (default): English AAC-LC 5.1 Surround 384kbps audio2: English AAC-LC 2.0 Stereo 128kbps subs: English built in, off by default, software switchable subs: S_HDMV/PGS Picture based subtitle format used on BDs/HD-DVDs (no OCR) source: Blu-Ray Riffers: Jonah Ray, Baron Vaughn (Tom Servo), Hampton Yount (Crow T. Robot) logos: intro and outro logos removed except for part of SOL logo at end 14 episodes plus 1 documentary extra bonus (docu 2ch only with no subs) 21hours 58minutes 11seconds 36,205,332,163bytes 2017.04.17 Netflix Release 2018.04.17 Blu-Ray Release https://www.imdb.com/title/tt6782014/ These are x265 HEVC with AAC audio encodes of the Mystery Science Theater 3000 The Return Season11 BluRay box set. Constant quality RF = 23.50 was used unless the resulting encode was too large (over 4500kbps) or too small (under 2000kbps). In those cases the RF was adjusted so the encode was just within the desired range of 2000kbps-4500kbps. The audio was sourced from DTS-HD 5.1 and the subtitles are passthrough from the BluRay (i.e. no OCR). The subtitles are italics for riffing and they note who is riffing - Jonah, Crow, or Tom - and if they are speaking or singing. The following logos were removed or shortened so when playing an episode it immediately starts with an SOL establishing shot. After the stinger scene at the end of the episode, 3.5seconds of the silent Satellite of Love LLC logo is shown and then the episode ends. The documentary was fully encoded including the opening and closing logo. Including some removed beginning and ending black frames, the total change in time is about 17-18seconds less for each episode compared to the BluRay. Opening logo: *Netflix(open) ~5sec - completely removed Closing logos: * Satellite of Love LLC ~4.0sec - shortened by ~0.5sec * Abominable Pictures ~1.9sec - completely removed * Shout Factory ~4.0sec - completely removed * Netflix(close) ~5.3sec - completely removed Please check out other shares of MST3K, Cinematic Titanic, The Film Crew, Rifftrax, Battlestar Galactica, DC Comics, Gotham, Star Trek, Star Wars, audiobooks, documentaries, music and more at your favorite sharing sites. Thanks
